title: [Bug]: electronCLIFlags are not picked up from config.json
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

electronCLIFlags statements in config.json don't seem to apply

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

2.0.10

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
If I run teams-for-linux with these command-line arguments:

$ teams-for-linux --enable-features=UseOzonePlatform,WaylandWindowDecorations --ozone-platform-hint=auto

I get Electron to use Wayland protocol (the flags are based on https://dev.to/archerallstars/how-to-run-electron-apps-under-linuxs-wayland-session-like-a-pro-2g25).

Based on app/config/README.md, I've edited `.config/teams-for-linux/config.json` and added a top-level property:


    "electronCLIFlags": [
      [ "enable-features", "UseOzonePlatform,WaylandWindowDecorations"],
      ["ozone-platform-hint", "auto" ]
    ]


I tried adding leading `--`, doesn't make a difference.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
I expect that the same flags, as specified in the command line, would apply if listed in `/electronCLIFlags` property.
```
